extendedInfo.description: The most popular Sudoku game in Google Play has been polished to perfection.Free Sudoku is an extension of the great Andoku, offering the same cool features and game variations:â¢ Standard Sudokuâ¢ X-Sudokuâ¢ Hyper-Sudokuâ¢ Percent-Sudokuâ¢ Color-Sudokuâ¢ Squiggly SudokuThe Free Sudoku extension includes 15000 new puzzles, App to SD, and a new Sudoku Strategy Tutorial, which will help you learn how to solve from the easiest puzzles for beginners to the Fiendish puzzles for advanced users.Finally, the Interface has also been enhanced, solving a popular demand... now you can enter pencil marks with just one digit. Something many advanced users requested in previous versions of this awesome game.This game is completely free, and will eventually be supported by unobtrusive adds.Hope you like it, please rate us if you do!

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great implementation of a terrific game. I enjoy playing against my best times. Lots of visual clues as to which numbers are complete.
reviews.author: Graham Hayes

reviews.title: Challenging
reviews.comment: Love Sudoku...love the ease of game and layout and can move up in skill level...nice going with this app!
reviews.author: Eileen Ferrarie

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: This is a good app.  Keeps the brain sharp. Best part is is a free app and comparable to other apps which are priced. I love this game.
reviews.author: Chetan Shah

reviews.title: Fun game to play when bored.
reviews.comment: I like to play this game. This form of sudoku is easy and helps you improve.
reviews.author: Sweety Cooks

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: The UI is easy to access and the gameplay is so far the best I got in Android. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Nyuk Ting Ho

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Ease of play, simple input, numbers arranged like keypad instead of annoying rows.  One thing lacking, though. We need a button to clear the whole mess and start over.
reviews.author: Deonaha Conlin

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great game. Very addictive with all the different modes of plays and levels of difficulty.
reviews.author: Crystal Nuckols

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Wonderful game and presentation. Fast and the ads are not intrusive. By far the best sudoku game on Google Play.
reviews.author: Michael Sloop

reviews.title: Sudoku cool android
reviews.comment: This is an uncomplicated Sudoku game, very easy to use. I\'ve only played one game so far but am really enjoying it. No snags up to now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Game
reviews.comment: This game is addictive. You start playing and when you finally look up, hours have gone by.  Charlie
reviews.author: Cathrine Reed

reviews.title: Perfect for Sudoku Lovers
reviews.comment: When u enter a number it shows u where the same number is on the rest of the screen to prevent accidental duplication. Also, the screen is eye friendly so u don\'t feel strained after a few games. The program is super easy to manoeuvre through. The BEST Sudoku out there so far!
reviews.author: Pars ifarsi

reviews.title: Copy of super sudoku
reviews.comment: Looks like a ripoff of super sodoku with ads. Not as good as the original.
reviews.author: Ris Jai

reviews.title: Decent sudoku
reviews.comment: Not the most elegant design, but lots of game styles and difficulties. And its free.
reviews.author: Justin Bennett

reviews.title: Pretty Sweet!
reviews.comment: Great way to play. Fun and  easy. Could use some cool colors or background.
reviews.author: Sheila Wurzbach

reviews.title: Its sudoku
reviews.comment: It is what it says on the tin, it\'s sudoku.  Nice play, really easy.
reviews.author: Tracy Parker

reviews.title: Sudoku
reviews.comment: Great version of this game. The highlighted numbers \"PP
reviews.author: Kevin Woods

reviews.title: Avid player
reviews.comment: I really like this game. It\'s easy to play and easy for new players to get familiar with the game. I love being able to see the time it took me to complete a game.
reviews.author: Janet Grant

reviews.title: Suduko
reviews.comment: Totally addicted to this   game.  It has spoiled me to all the other suduko games
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dragonsglory
reviews.comment: Excellent clarity and gratifying result once won.  Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung tab
reviews.comment: Easy setup, move up levels. Excellent
reviews.author: Cyndi Rowley
